snippet: The small Greek Orthodox church that stood as a reprieve from the city’s furious financial nerve center was crushed as the World Trade Center collapsed on Sept. 11.
abstract: High-ranking officials of Greek Orthodox Church bless ground where new St Nicholas church will be built in Downtown Manhattan; church was crushed when World Trade Center's south tower collapsed on September 11, 2001.
lead_paragraph: The small Greek Orthodox church that stood as a reprieve from the city’s furious financial nerve center was crushed as the World Trade Center collapsed on Sept. 11.

headline.main: Razed by Terror Attacks, a Church Will Rise Anew
headline.print_headline: Razed by the 9/11 Terror Attacks, a Greek Orthodox Church Will Rise Anew

keywords.value: St Nicholas National Shrine at the World Trade Center (Manhattan, NY)
keywords.name: organizations
